Quick Answers

Frequently Asked Questions

Find quick answers to common questions about our mobile signal boosters.

The best signal booster depends on your coverage area, signal type needs, and carrier. Use our Booster Quiz to get personalized recommendations, or contact our experts for a free consultation.

We offer free standard shipping (5-7 business days) and express shipping options (1-2 business days). All orders are processed within 1-2 business days.

Yes! We provide detailed installation guides, video tutorials, and free technical support. Our team can walk you through the installation process step-by-step.

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all products. If you're not satisfied with your signal booster's performance, you can return it for a full refund.
